Posts.HTML:
Why isn't this code working?

@title Testing

Finally you can go to the [[stadium]]!

[bottle]:
@replace 1=newtext

You pick up the empty bottle.

[newtext]:
You throw a bottle and think about heading to the [[market]].

[[stadium]]:
Another [bottle], believe or not! What a beautiful day!
{label:1=You didn't throw anything}!

[[market]]:
What a beautiful market over here.

Posts.EditableText: Your passages are in the wrong place. Sections contain passages, so stadium is a new section and bottle needs to be after it.
Posts.HTML: Your passages are in the wrong place. Sections contain passages, so stadium is a new section and bottle needs to be after it.
